Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
Central Labor Rehabilitation Council and NYC Community Services Committee Records
Gehan, John J.
WAG.082
4 Linear Feet (4 boxes)
1963-1984
Scope and Contents
INVENTORY AVAILABLE IN REPOSITORY
Conditions Governing Access
Materials are open without restrictions.
Conditions Governing Use
Copyright (or related rights to publicity and privacy) for materials in this collection, created by the Central Labor Rehabilitation Council and NYC Community Services Committee was not transferred to New York University. Permission to use materials must be secured from the copyright holder.
Immediate Source of Acquisition
Donated by John J. Gehan, Administrator of the Central Labor Rehabilitation Council and NYC Community Services Committee, 1992. The accession number associated with this gift is 1992.020.
Gehan, John J.
